text:
@bbcnickrobinson @BBCr4today Why is anyone talking to Johnson’s dad? Next we’ll be seeing Johnson in his hospital bed on the front cover of Hello, surrounded by his loved ones. 

How about talking to the families of almost 8,000 people who’ve so far died of Covid19 in the U.K.?
